_header: In the season of Février when it was full cold
Subjects: flowers, praise of; Margaret, praise of; love
_description: A Ballade in praise of Margaret, the daisy — seven stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC599.First Lines:
In the season of ffeuere when hit was full coldeffrost and snowe
                    hayle Rayne hath dominacion…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…So wysely god for hys endelese mercyGraunt euery trew lyuere
                    to haue ioy of his [ ]
CamTCC599.Note: Ends of some lines, stanzas 3-7, lost by cropping.
